name: Curse of the Corsair
description:
Echoes of a swashbuckling and treacherous past reverberate through a vast and untamed sea, brimming with riches and danger. In this action-packed adventure RPG, you'll set sail on a journey inspired by the modern classic Hyper Light Drifter, but with a salty, scurvy twist.

As a pirate in search of lost treasures and hidden knowledge, you'll explore a world full of danger and wonder. But beware: your character is plagued by a debilitating curse, driving you ever deeper into the mysterious depths of the ocean in search of a cure for the curse of the Corsair.

• With everything from characters to environments rendered in lovingly hand-drawn animations, you'll be fully immersed in a vibrant and dangerous pirate world.
• Slice and dice by getting up close and personal with melee combat or engage from afar with ranged weapons, it's up to you!
• The challenges you'll face are daunting and plentiful; enemies are ruthless, the environment can be unforgiving, and true allies are few and far between.
• Discover new weapons, learn unique skills, and uncover valuable equipment as you navigate through a detailed and branching world full of secrets and hidden paths.

Set sail for adventure and discover the untold riches and ancient secrets that await you in this epic pirate RPG!
